title: Power train
creator_credit: Films/West, Industrial Animation Films, George Dunning and Teru Murakami
brief_description: This animated program explains the workings of the automotive transmission system. Reveals the need for and the mechanics of each major component: clutch, gearbox, universal joint, drive shaft and differential.
creator_credit_for_label: Films/West, Industrial Animation Films, George Dunning and Teru Murakami
